name: Canon EOS 3000D DSLR Camera with 18-55mm Lens
description: Capture your world in crisp detail, beautiful background blur and 18MP resolution then view instantly on the hi res 2.7” LCD. The built-in feature guide helps you understand each mode as you use it, guiding you to capture even more beautiful images

name: Nikon D850 DSLR Camera (Body Only)
description: The D850 has extraordinary image clarity with its 45.7 megapixels, its resolution that is best suited to professional large-format printing; An ISO range of 64 to 25600 also allows extreme versatility. As a first for Nikon, full-frame 4K UHD can be filmed in both Nikon FX-based and DX-based formats; With built in 4K Time-lapse mode, slow-mo Mode

name: Canon EOS 2000D Kit [18-55 DC III] DSLR Camera - International Version - Black
description: 24.1 megapixel APS-C CMOS sensor, FullHD 1920, 1080 30p video recording, AF sensor with 9 cross-type AF points

name: Sony Alpha 7 III Digital E-Mount Camera with 35mm Full Frame Image Sensor (Body Only), ILCE7M3B

name: Sony Alpha NEX-3 Interchangeable Lens Digital Camera w/18-55mm Lens (Silver)- 14.2 Mpix
description: The quality of a DSLR in about half the size, weight. Same APS-C sensor size, same resolution as Alpha DSLRs. World's smallest, lightest interchangeable lens camera

name: Canon EOS R7 Mirrorless Camera with RFS18-150STM Travel Lens
description: With RF-S 18-150mm f/3.5-6.3 IS STM. Up to 30 frames per second continuous shooting. High performance subject tracking
